item.title: AcuGemma Version 0.1
item.description: I recently took part in the Google Gemma 3n hackathon which inspired me to explore the exciting possibilities of on-device machine learning. I built an educational application targeting primary school students after reading a Daily monitor article that highlighted the challenges faced by teachers and students in Eastern Uganda under the Universal Primary Education program. This article’s publication coincided with the start of the competition, creating a powerful sense of purpose.
